fk_info.fk_def: FOREIGN KEY (cedula_visitante) REFERENCES visitantes(cedula) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE

FOREIGN KEY (estado) REFERENCES estado_ejemplar(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (isbn_vol) REFERENCES volumen(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE

FOREIGN KEY (fuente_suministro) REFERENCES fuentes_suministro(id) ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE RESTRICT
FOREIGN KEY (accion_id) REFERENCES acciones(id) ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE RESTRICT

FOREIGN KEY (editorial) REFERENCES editorial(id) ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE RESTRICT
FOREIGN KEY (id_autor) REFERENCES autores(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (isbn_libro) REFERENCES libros(isbn) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE

FOREIGN KEY (id_categoria) REFERENCES categorias(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (cedula_visitante) REFERENCES visitantes(cedula) ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE RESTRICT

FOREIGN KEY (lector) REFERENCES visitantes(cedula) ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE RESTRICT
FOREIGN KEY (estado) REFERENCES estado_actividad(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (rol) REFERENCES rol(id_rol) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
